      • setUniform

        public void setUniform(java.lang.String uniformName,
                       int value)
        Sets the specified uniform variable.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - - name of an already created uniform variable. Will throw a NullPointerException if the uniform has not been created.
        value - - the value for the uniform variable to be set to.

      • hasUniform

        public boolean hasUniform(java.lang.String uniformName)
        Checks if the shader has a definition for a uniform.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - - the name of the searched uniform
        Returns:
        true if the uniform has already been defined, false if it is not.

      • createSSBO

        public int createSSBO(java.lang.String name,
                      int binding)

      • setSSBO

        public void setSSBO(java.lang.String name,
                    java.nio.FloatBuffer data,
                    int usage)

      • bind

        public void bind()
        the shader will be used after this line till it is either unbound or another shader is bound.

      • unbind

        public void unbind()
        no shader will be used after this line till a shader is bound.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        deletes the shader. It can be created again with create() and used normally after that.
